resources.string: Add link to your Facebook profile
In order to use Google Maps in Realay, please grant access to the device storage.
Always download an up to date list of Realays near you.
Before you can join, you need to move into the circle on the map. \nCheck your Location Settings if you are already here.
Please enable location access to see a list of Realays in your town.
Cannot upload this file at the moment. \nPlease make sure you are connected to the internet and try again later.
Please choose the language of the message you want to share.
Do you really want to delete the conversation with %1$s?
Displays everyone you have currently blocked and allows you to unblock them.
Do you want to permanently ban %1$s?
The person will no longer be able to contact you.

Please enable the location access through the device settings. 

This way, Realay makes sure you only talk to people who are really around you. 

GPS/High Accuracy is optional.
The Realay you were in ended a while ago.
An error occurred. Sorry about that!
This type of file cannot be used. Please choose another one.
You can usually find the password at the entrance to the Realay or at a special point of interest. Maybe someone around you knows the password.
Feel free to return to the Realay and join again.
Ask someone for the password to join this Realay.
If you have used Realay on this device before, use your old username to log back into your profile.
Please join a Realay in your vicinity to share a file with others.
You can only be logged in until %1$s.
Your user name cannot be empty.
You have not blocked anyone.\n\n If you want to keep someone from contacting you, tap and hold one of their messages in a public chat or select \'Block User\' from the menu in a private conversation.

Welcome!

There are no public messages yet.

Be the first to say something.
In this Realay, you currently do not have any private conversations. \n\nChoose a person from the user list to start a 1-on-1 chat.
Could not find any Realays in your town. \nPlease try again later.
There are currently no other people online in this place. \n\nInvite someone around you to join Realay.
Please note that you will not receive any location hints, if you disable all Realay notifications.
The event of this Realay has not started yet. Please wait until %1$s.
Notify me about everything going on in the public group chat of a Realay.
Notify me about messages that are sent only to me.
You can only be in one Realay at a time.\n \nIf you leave, you will no longer receive any messages.
This Realay was part of an event that ended at %1$s.
This Realay is part of an event that ended at %1$s. \n\nYou can stay logged in here until %2$s.
Would you like to share this image with everyone or only with one person?
You have been requested to leave.

Please return to the area of the current Realay until %1$s. 

Keep Wi-Fi & mobile network location activated. 

GPS / high accuracy is optional. Enabling Wi-Fi is recommended.
Besides blocking, you can also send us an automated report about this person\'s behaviour. \n\nYou are able to unblock someone in the app settings, at any time.
Your session had to be terminated.
Please stay within the area of the Realay and make sure that your location can be verified every once in a while.
Connecting seems to take longer than usual…
A timeout occurred. \n\nFor several minutes, the app could not connect to the internet to receive new messages.
Cannot open Google Maps. \nPlease update Google Play Services.
Use feet, yard and miles instead of metres and kilometres.
Do you want to leave this Realay?
